Types

Procs

proc config[T: object](self: var Clip[T]): T
Get the parsed configurations into a configuration object. Arguments, configurations and defaults, are merged in that order of priority. Source   Edit   
proc help[T: object](self: Clip[T]): string
Source   Edit   
proc initClip[T: object](default: T = default(T)): Clip[T]
Initialize Clip, optionally with the default configurations. Source   Edit   
proc parseArgs[T: object](self: var Clip[T]; args: seq[string]): seq[string]
Parse command line options, the result is the remaining arguments from the first non-option argument. Source   Edit   
proc parseConf[T: object](self: var Clip[T]; config: string)
Parse configurations from a string. The config string is a list of key=value pairs separated by newlines. The config parameter is usually the contents of a configuration file. Lines starting with # are ignored. Source   Edit   
proc unknownArgs[T](self: var Clip[T]): seq[string]
Get the user's arguments that do not belong to the configuration object. Source   Edit   
proc unknownConfigs[T](self: var Clip[T]): seq[string]
Get the user's configurations that do not belong to the configuration object. Source   Edit

Short option alternative for the option. Source   Edit
